AT.name: Drop It: Block Paradise!
AT.description: Macht euch gefasst für Drop It: Block Paradise, ein Spiel mit Physikpuzzles, deren Ziel ist, Sterne per Touch-Steuerung aus luftigen Höhen zu Boden zu leiten. Hierzu stehen Dir die hilfreichen Geschwister Tip und Tap zur Not mit Ratschlägen bei. Je besser Deine Leistung, desto höher die Belohnung: Concept Art, Stempel und Musik stehen zum Freischalten für gesammelte Sterne bereit! Insgesamt erwarten dich 150 Level, welche jedoch nur der Anfang sind. Zusätzlich kannst Du im Level-Editor mit denselben Werkzeugen, die von den Entwicklern genutzt wurden und zahlreiche weitere Optionen anbieten, Dein eigenes perfektes Level erstellen. Dein Meisterwerk kannst Du dann auch noch mit der Welt in der Block Database für jeden spielbar teilen. Aus diesem Sortiment kannst auch Du unzählig viele verrückte Kreationen Anderer genießen und am Spaß teilhaben!

AU.name: Drop It: Block Paradise!
AU.description: Get ready for Drop It: Block Paradise, a physics-puzzle game where your goal is to guide stars from their lofty heights to safe ground by touching the colorful blocks they stand on. You won’t have to go it alone - helpful siblings Tip and Tap are always on hand to give you some tutorial tips on where to tap. The better your results on each stage, the more stars you can earn to unlock concept art, stamps, and funky beats to jam out to! 150 levels in all await you, but that’s just the beginning. Edit Mode gives you access to all the tools used in the main game, with tons of customization so you can create the perfect level. But what good is a level if there’s no one to share it with? Luckily, you can upload your magnum opus to the Block Database for all to play, as well as enjoy the myriad of crazy creations other players have come up with!

BG.name: Drop It: Block Paradise!
BG.description: Get ready for Drop It: Block Paradise, a physics-puzzle game where your goal is to guide stars from their lofty heights to safe ground by touching the colorful blocks they stand on. You won’t have to go it alone - helpful siblings Tip and Tap are always on hand to give you some tutorial tips on where to tap. The better your results on each stage, the more stars you can earn to unlock concept art, stamps, and funky beats to jam out to! 150 levels in all await you, but that’s just the beginning. Edit Mode gives you access to all the tools used in the main game, with tons of customization so you can create the perfect level. But what good is a level if there’s no one to share it with? Luckily, you can upload your magnum opus to the Block Database for all to play, as well as enjoy the myriad of crazy creations other players have come up with!

BE.name: Drop It: Block Paradise!
BE.description: Soyez prêts pour Drop It: Block Paradise, un jeu de réflexion basé sur la physique où le but est d'amener des étoiles de leur hauteur lointaines jusqu'en lieu sûr en touchant les blocs colorés sur lesquels elles reposent. Vous ne serez pas seul - les serviables frères Tip et Tap sont toujours disponibles pour vous conseiller sur vos tapotements. Plus vos résultats s'améliorent et plus vous gagnez d'étoiles qui permettent de débloquer de l'art conceptuel, des timbres et des rythmes funky distrayants ! 150 niveaux en tout vous attendent mais ce n'est que le début. Le Mode Édition vous donne accès à tous les outils du jeu, avec des tonnes de personnalisations afin que vous puissiez créer le niveau parfait. Mais à quoi sert un niveau parfait si on ne peut pas le partager ? Heureusement vous pouvez envoyer votre chef-d'œuvre à la base de données Block afin que tout le monde puisse y jouer et vous profitez aussi de la myriade de créations folles que les autres joueurs ont conçue !

ES.name: Drop It: Block Paradise!
ES.description: Prepárate para Drop It: Block Paradise, un juego de puzzle de físicas donde tu objectivo es guiar estrellas desde increíbles alturas a un terreno seguro al tocar los bloques coloridos en las que se encuentran. No hay razón para ir solo o sola - los útiles hermanos Tip y Tap estarán siempre a mano para darte algunos consejos sobre dónde tocar. ¡Cuanto mejores sean tus resultados en cada nivel, más seran las estrellas que ganarás para desbloquear arte conceptual, sellos y melodías funky que te harán bailar! Te esperan un total de 150 niveles, pero eso es sólo el comienzo. El modo de edición te dará acceso a todas las herramientas utilizadas en el juego principal, ¡con toneladas de personalizaciones para crear el nivel perfecto! ¿Pero de qué un nivel si no hay nadie con quien compartirlo? Por suerte, puedes subir tus obras maestras a la base de datos para que todos jueguen, como así disfrutar de las numerosas creaciones de otros jugadores!

IT.name: Drop It: Block Paradise!
IT.description: Preparati per Drop It: Block Paradise, un puzzle game basato sulla fisica in cui il tuo obiettivo è quello di guidare le stelle dalle loro elevate altezze ad un terreno sicuro toccando i blocchi colorati su cui si poggiano. Non dovrai farlo da solo, i fratelli TIP e TAP sono sempre a tua disposizione per darti alcuni suggerimenti utili su dove colpire. Migliori saranno i risultati in ogni livello, più stelle potrai guadagnare per sbloccare concept art, timbri e musiche da urlo da ascoltare a piacimento! Ti aspettano 150 livelli in tutto, ma questo è solo l'inizio. L'Edit Mode ti consente di accedere a tutti gli strumenti utilizzati nel gioco principale e a tonnellate di personalizzazioni, in modo da poter creare il livello perfetto. Ma a che serve un livello se non c'è nessuno con cui condividerlo? Fortunatamente, è possibile caricare il tuo capolavoro nel Block Database per permettere a tutti di giocarlo, oltre a farti divertire con la miriade di creazioni folli che altri giocatori hanno escogitato!

LT.name: Drop It: Block Paradise!

The better your results on each stage, the more stars you can earn to unlock concept art, stamps, and funky beats to jam out to! 150 levels in all await you, but that’s just the beginning. ZA.description: Get ready for Drop It: Block Paradise, a physics-puzzle game where your goal is to guide stars from their lofty heights to safe ground by touching the colorful blocks they stand on. You won’t have to go it alone - helpful siblings Tip and Tap are always on hand to give you some tutorial tips on where to tap. The better your results on each stage, the more stars you can earn to unlock concept art, stamps, and funky beats to jam out to! 150 levels in all await you, but that’s just the beginning. Edit Mode gives you access to all the tools used in the main game, with tons of customization so you can create the perfect level. But what good is a level if there’s no one to share it with? Luckily, you can upload your magnum opus to the Block Database for all to play, as well as enjoy the myriad of crazy creations other players have come up with!
